title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 10051.7 - Requests for records and information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 10051.7 - Requests for records and information

State Regulations
(a) All requests made pursuant to this Part
shall be made in writing and must be accompanied by reasonable proof of
identity pursuant to section
10051.4
of this Part. (b) A request shall reasonably describe the
records and personal information sought. When possible, the data subject should
supply identifying information that assists the authority in locating the
information sought. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
10051.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
